headline: NEXE Innovations Inc. Announces 1.2 Million Compostable Pod Order to Support Bridgehead’s Planned Costco Launch
summary: WINDSOR, Ontario, Nov. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NEXE Innovations Inc. ("NEXE", the "Company", "we", "us" or "our") (TSX.V: NEXE) (Frankfurt: NX5) (OTC: NEXNF), a compostable and innovative materials company, is pleased to announce a significant purchase order of 1.2 million compostable coffee pods from its partner, Bridgehead Coffee ("Bridgehead"), to support Bridgehead’s upcoming launch at Costco, one of Canada’s largest national retailers. The order marks a significant commercial milestone

content.title: NEXE Innovations Inc. Announces 1.2 Million Compostable Pod Order to Support Bridgehead’s Planned Costco Launch
content.summary: WINDSOR, Ontario, Nov. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NEXE Innovations Inc. ("NEXE", the "Company", "we", "us" or "our") (TSX.V: NEXE) (Frankfurt: NX5) (OTC: NEXNF), a compostable and innovative materials company, is pleased to announce a significant purchase order of 1.2 million compostable coffee pods from its partner, Bridgehead Coffee ("Bridgehead"), to support Bridgehead’s upcoming launch at Costco, one of Canada’s largest national retailers. The order marks a significant commercial milestone
